amendment.description: Amendment provides that if local law enforcement block grant funds are used to increase the number of law enforcement officers, a net gain in the number of officers who perform nonadministrative public safety service must be achieved.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to require that if a unit of local government uses funds available under this Act to increase the number of law enforcement officers, the local government will achieve a net gain in the number of law enforcement officers who perform nonadministrative public safety service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
